originInfo.publisher: Louisiana. Dept. of Wildlife and Fisheries

mods.abstract: Fleet of boats at site of dynamite-oyster experiments. The "Ostrea"(oyster research boat), the "Louisiana"(oyster boat), and the "Muskrat"(fur coat), all three of the fleet of the Department of Wild Life and Fisheries. At the right is the dynamite bat "Eagle Pass" of the Gulf Oil Corporation.

titleInfo.title: Louisiana Sea Grant Digital Images Collection

mods.accessCondition: Copyright of federal and state documents is in the public domain.
